text.autoconfig.nowplaying.title: Now Playing - Settings
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.sidePo: Controls where the mod widget's will be displayed on your screen.
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.yPosit: Controls the mod widget's position on the Y axis (vertically).
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.fontSi: Controls the size of the text on screen.
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.backgr: How transparent should the background of the widget be?
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.showCo: Should the cover art for what you're listening to be displayed?
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.showTi: Display the track length as well as the current position?
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.showAr: Show the artist name for the media that's currently playing?
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.showMe: Show the title for the media that's currently playing?
text.autoconfig.nowplaying.option.showPl: Display an icon next to the timeline that shows if the media is playing or paused?
